text: Ty, o poslannik, starayesh'sya vesti svoy narod pryamym putom, no ty ne smozhesh' vvesti v islam vsekh, kogo lyubish'. Tol'ko Allakh vedot k pryamomu puti tekh, serdtsa kotorykh sklonny k vere i k pryamomu puti, o chom Vsevyshniy znayet. Poistine, Allakh - Vsevedushchiy, znayet, kto voydot v chislo smirennykh uverovavshikh
